name: Shattered (itch) (smlim991, LujieZ, simonlsc, BowenG)
description:
Welcome to Shattered! Our game is a puzzle game to test the player's memory capacity! Inspired by the bridge game in the show Squid Games and the breaking platforms in the game Fall Guys, this game challenges the player to remember the traps and plan their route to collect enough coins to move on. 

The space/futuristic theme adds a calm suspense to the gameplay and also a fear factor of exploring space or unknown places. 

Randomly generated traps, coins and keys also adds a new element to the game everytime it is played.
